Effect of a Veteranâ€™s Failure to RSVP
When VHA provides notification that the Veteran failed to RSVP, the
RO must
attempt to locate a better or more current address, as discussed in
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.F.1.c
and
d

handle the situation as commensurate with a failure to report for examination, following the procedures outlined in
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.F.1.a

title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F - Failure to Report and Rescheduling Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F
